sequence:
Gentle and Sweet Ooshio!

<size=45>Do Ya Like Girls?</size>

scripts.say: Ooshio and I observed the fleet as they were training.
Hot as heck today, don'tcha think... We oughta get in the shade of that tree, else we might be riskin' a heatstroke.
...Honestly, nobody should even be out trainin' in this sizzlin' heat...
We decided to stand in the shade of the tree together. The pleasant sea breeze blew against our bodies and cooled them down.
Commander, don'tcha think hardworkin' girls are mighty cute? Hehehe♪
Just watchin' 'em exertin' themselves and workin' up a sweat makes my heart go thump thump~
Ah, I don't mean I get a kick outta watchin' people hurt! I'm just sayin' I love cute girls, that's all~
The day of training was over.
As I was making sure everyone was heading back to the dormitory, Ooshio proposed we "take a short walk together."
Gosh, what a pretty sunset~ Ya think the seagulls like watchin' the sun settin' over the ocean too?
Ah, also, since everyone's worked their butts off today, I was hopin' I could convince ya to treat 'em with some snow cones... Whaddya say, Commander?
Hehe♪ Then I'mma go on ahead 'n get the word out~
As soon as Ooshio heard my reply, she ran off to talk to all the girls who had finished training.
Just another quiet day at the base.
